org.usfirst.frc.team5002.drive.swerve

Class SwerveDrive2018

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team5002.drive.swerve.SwerveDrive2018
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drive, SwerveDrive

    public class SwerveDrive2018
extends java.lang.Object
implements SwerveDrive
    This class manages all four swerve modules and does calculations for wheel angle, wheel speed, etc. This class also implements SwerveDrive. TODO:Implement wpilib Command class.

      • setTurn

        public void setTurn(float strafe)
        This sets setTurn (x/strafe), setDrive (y/forward), and setTwist (z/twist) and calls Drive after setiing.
        Specified by:
        setTurn in interface Drive
        Parameters:
        forward - x/ the forwards and backward motion
        strafe - y/ the side to side motion
        twist - z/ turning and twisting

      • setDrive

        public void setDrive(float forward)
        Description copied from interface: Drive
        Begin driving at a specific speed.
        Specified by:
        setDrive in interface Drive
        Parameters:
        forward - The speed and direction of the motor: expressed as a percentage of maximum power between -1 and +1, with 0 being a complete stop.

      • setTwist

        public void setTwist(float twist)
        Description copied from interface: SwerveDrive
        Set the twisting rate. This means rotating robot chassis while continuing to drive in a straight line.
        Specified by:
        setTwist in interface SwerveDrive
        Parameters:
        twist - The rate of twisting expressed as a percentage of maximum twisting rate. Should be between -1 and +1, with 0 being no twisting at all.
